channel.title: My Source (Zaradomin-Scape v1)release-go to download section
channel.description:
a lot of commands i had been keeping this source for like a year and im thinking of release i need ur opinions....
theres more then just these
[IMG]http://i477.photobucket.com/albums/rr135/zaradomin/myserver2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i477.photobucket.com/albums/rr135/zaradomin/myserver.jpg[/img] and i been meaning to update train
some commands
::gay ::smsg ::jail ::unjail ::modglow ::modglowoff ::adminglow ::adminglowoff ::ownerglow ::ownerglowoff ::m ::empty ::paramore ::saradomik ::leon ::starter ::drunk ::nosnow ::master ::pure ::zamorak ::zaradomin ::modstuff ::adminstuff ::modwear ::drunkoff ::afk ::back ::food ::owner ::boom ::eat ::smsg ::alert ::makeg ::syell
and the pets there two kinds slayer pets which follows and can be attk any time
and then theres cats i didnt post a pic of cats since im a bit lazy the cats folo but they dont fite
you have to complete jewels retrieval to buy cats
oh yea i also have an economic crisis i added an dugeon that drop a lot of rares but i put about a lot of monsters there and they all drop rares they attk very high.........
[i will update this topic soon when i add another quest] base: allstarscape not completed ::syi protection i added a laghandler[thanks Gnarly]reduces lagg
please leave a comment if u saw this
if u are one of my players
I WILL REMOVE THE CHARACTER FILES NO HACKING NUBS[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 27, 2009, 06:22:47 pm[/size][hr]i still need to add credits to it dont be mad if i didnt add ur names to the credits cuz its not ready for downloads when its time for download i will add ur names
second pictures last of em unless u want commands picture
[IMG]http://i477.photobucket.com/albums/rr135/zaradomin/update.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i477.photobucket.com/albums/rr135/zaradomin/update2.jpg[/img]
pest doesnt work well they just attk u its really hard u dont earn points or anything
i did not take a picture of my dungeon[economic crisis solved]way too dangerous way dangerous then challenge
post your opinions
[FAULTS(never done)] -anti syi-get at least 100 errors per tutorial -pest-i dunno much bout giving out points and the exchange thingy -assualt-never bother to do it most of the mini games were ignored -make a real actual quest from scratch-i just edit the cooks assistance -one connection per ip-i did this and no can login and i had to remove it [i think this is mostly all of the faults]

@recker450 wrote:

almost done need to work on

dramen staff-tele u to new city
add shops and monsters to new city

not gonna release v2 so far i visited the status page and none of my source are online so i guess v2 isnt needed

Read full topic

item.title: My Source (Zaradomin-Scape v1)release-go to download section
item.dc:creator: @lolwut44 lolwut44
item.description:
@lolwut44 wrote:

The whole lag handler idea is fucking retarded, servers wouldn’t need lag handlers if they were coded right and lag handlers don’t even affect performance at all. If you think it does, then explain to me what a lag handler does and how that improves the performance.

Read full topic

Some of the pictures including the orb viewing is similar to deltascape.

@recker450 wrote:

jamie?whose jamie?this isnt czar its allstar v2 but though its czar base i guess some credits go to reforced and i also need 4 more comments bout releasing b4 i can release other wise there wont be enough downloads

feed back of what you think and what if it should be release now even though it sorta incomplete

my sig is non sense

my v2 will take another year since im gonna start over on delta since it has a lot of quests and has working pest
everyting might be better on v2

i said MIGHT. ok? there is a chance

no theres no lagg i had one of my friends play and he say theres no lag
i deleted a bunch of npc so there wont be a lot of lagg
i added a laghandler.java
from gnarly
and if i add one connection per ip i couldnt login
tried meiscooldude tutorial

i just need 5 more comments about releasing this source so i can release
i dont want it to be boring for u guys

item.title: My Source (Zaradomin-Scape v1)release-go to download section
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:3, topic:258873”][quote author=vic 08 link=topic=341840.msg2644250#msg2644250 date=1233105317]
" i had been keeping this source for like a year and im thinking of release " - 508’s haven’t been out that long.

Also, I guess it looks alright. I don't believe you did all these things you claimed you did, like the NPC following ect.. But its getting there. I wouldn't release it yet because it still doesn't look finished. Plus the 508's are pretty much the same as the one you're releasing. But you just added some commands, not a real improvement. Keep working.

[/quote]

Vic, this isn’t a 5** server. :P[/quote]

Oh, wtf… Stupid custom items… Plus that shield, I thought it was on 508’s only ;p

Read full topic
